text.en: Chief among the learned and accomplished of the noble land,
text.en-trans: pakyul khé dang drubpé khyuchok ni

text.en: Lord of Dharma, unparalleled in wisdom, love and power,
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nü pa tsungmé chö kyi jé

text.en: The thought of whom brings a nectar-like rain of blessings—
Smṛtijñānakīrti, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: smiti jnané zhab la solwa deb
